cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value will cause security configuration parsing error and prevent proper ciphering setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to a negative value will cause MIMO layer configuration error and disrupt beamforming operations.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為負值會導致 MIMO 層配置錯誤，並干擾波束成形操作。
